content: pattern available at craftster here 1 1 http //www craftster org/forum/index php topic=207200 0 this rippled crochet wrap is a christmas present i ve been working on for my mother-in-law it s actually the very first pattern i ve ever written down and created myself and i have to say it wasn t always easy although now that i m finished i m considering making another for myself it was inspired by a hairpin lace wrap from stitch diva www stitchdiva com i hope you enjoy it materials/gauge 9 mm hook size n dk or light worsted yarn 1 pattern repeat = 3 4 row = 3
